name: Alex
description: Alex is an utterly charming Cavalier King Charles Spaniel puppy, born on July 6th. With his playful spirit and those big, bright eyes, he’s ready to fill your days with joy! Alex is AKC registered and has received all his vaccinations, so he’s all set to find his forever home. Don’t miss out on this little bundle of happiness! Text 720-833-8083 for more details and to meet the adorable Alex!
